headline: American Water Unit Invests $675M in 2024 to Upgrade Infrastructure
summary: AWK continues to invest in upgrading and maintaining its infrastructure and provides high-quality services to its expanding customer base.

headline: American Water Shares Tips to Find and Fix Leaks During U.S. Environmental Protection Agency’s Fix a Leak Week 2025
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., March 17, 2025--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., highlights the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency’s (EPA) Fix a Leak Week 2025 by providing tips to help customers find and fix leaks in their homes.

headline: Buy 5 Low-Beta High-Yielding Stocks Amid Sagging Consumer Sentiment
summary: Five low-beta high-yielding stocks have strong growth potential for 2025. These are: AEE, ATO, AWK, ETR, NI.
